00065 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00066 //include protection
00067 #ifndef MD5_H
00068 #define MD5_H
00069 
00070 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00071 //STL includes
00072 #include <string>
00073 
00074 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00075 //hl includes
00076 #include "hl_types.h"
00077 
00078 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00079 //typedefs
00080 typedef hl_uint8 *POINTER;
00081 
00085 typedef struct 
00086 {
00088         unsigned long int state[4];           
00089 
00091         unsigned long int count[2];
00092 
00094         unsigned char buffer[64];
00095 } MD5_CTX;
00096 
00097 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00098 
00108 class MD5
00109 {
00110 
00111         private:
00112 
00118                 void MD5Transform (unsigned long int state[4], unsigned char block[64]);
00119 
00127                 void Encode (unsigned char* output,
00128                              unsigned long int *input,
00129                              unsigned int len);
00130 
00138                 void Decode (unsigned long int *output,
00139                              unsigned char *input,
00140                              unsigned int len);
00141 
00149                 void MD5_memcpy (POINTER output, POINTER input, unsigned int len);
00150 
00159                 void MD5_memset (POINTER output, int value, unsigned int len);
00160 
00161         public:
00162         
00168                 void MD5Init (MD5_CTX* context);
00169 
00178                 void MD5Update (MD5_CTX* context,
00179                                 unsigned char *input,
00180                                 unsigned int inputLen);
00181 
00190                 void MD5Final (unsigned char digest[16], MD5_CTX* context);
00191 
00195                 MD5(){};
00196 };
